articles.title: Three Generals of Mt. Paektu Registered as Honorary Citizens of Ecuador

articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Formed in Laos 
   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Lao National Youth Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated with due ceremony at the Laos-Korea Youth Friendship Center on Jan. 4.
 Khamphan Sittidampha, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony.    
 The chairman stressed the need to publish famous works of the peerlessly great men and organize multifarious political and cultural functions during the commemoration period and thus, deeply grasp the immortal feats they performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.

articles.content:
Title of Honorary Citizen to Three Generals of Mt. Paektu 
   Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A ceremony was held at the city hall of Troncal, Canar Province, Ecuador, on December 26 to award the title of honorary citizen of Troncal City to President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the February holiday.
 The decision of the city council to award the title to the three generals of Mt. Paektu was read out at the ceremony.    
 The mayor of the city in his speech said that it was a great event to be recorded in the history of Troncal City to award the title of honorary citizen to the three generals of Mt. Paektu and that the people of the city would work energetically to tighten the ties of friendship and solidarity with the Korean people, cherishing the pride of having the three generals as honorary citizens.
